Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Nabiyow matablaa! Diggah nanu sheytoona korosut rubneeh amol keenik haynem umaanê fanah gutuqiyyah ken gutuqak makot ken beytamkeh
Toysa Nabiyow ama korosih digaalah esserot maqataatakin!'cagalah Nanu ken qumrii kee ken taamoomi loowiyyah lownak
Yallak meesita mara (moominiin kinnuk) kobxisna ayroy Racmaan kinni Rabbî fanah irgay feereynaanih amot tanih ken bahna konnaba luk
Kaadu umeyniitih yan mara (koros kinnuk) jahannam girâ fanah ibaybah bakarruk foorisiyyah ken foorisnaah tet ken arkisna
Ama koros Shafaaqatta numuh abtam maduddaay, keenih tet abtam matan, kinnih immay cagalah Shafaaqatta abtu duddam Racmaan kinni Rabbih xaqul woo xagana haysite mara kinni (moominiin kinnuk)
Kaadu ama koros Racmaan kinni Rabbi baxa haysite itte
Nummah amah iyya maraw isin ama maxcot kaxxa ceele waytoy assacokki-le bahten
A-korosey ama sin maxcoy qaxumay edde yabteenih sabbatah qarnwa baxan baxsintaah baaxo Qaxam Qanxixxaah qaleela raddaah buluuliyyah bulultam xayyossu hayta
Usun Racmaan kinni Rabbi baxa-le iyyeenimih Sabbatah
Kaadu Racmaan kinni Rabbi baxa haysitam kaa maceltaay usuk wohuk kaxxa fayyah fayya iyye
Yallih ginok Hebelttô ginoy qaranwaa kee baaxol tani matan kulli num keenik Racmaan kinni Rabbî fanah naqasuy Ramma iyyaah xixxibaane-lih yanih yamaate kaa akke waytek Qhiyaamah ayro
Nummah Yalli isi ginok loowo arac xagseeh loowoh ken looweeh ken caagidik tu-kaak maqellitta
Kaadu keenik ummaan num Qhiyaamah ayro isi Rabbih xaqu dubuk amaate-le
Diggah yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite marah, Racmaan kinni Rabbi kay naqoosak moominiin sorkocobaxittet kacanu keenih heele
Toysa Nabiyow cagalah ama Qhuraan ku-arrabal xabbacosneh, Yallak meesita mara elle aytikumussaah deedalah kaxxa giddi-le mara edde meesissamkeh
Nabiyow ku-marak duma horaarik makina hora finqisnee?keenik inki num maay geytaah tableeh, hinnak dago xonglo kinni way keenik maay taabbee?matablaay mataabba
